price: 18. Ese día comparecerán (para ser juzgados), y no quedará oculto ningún secreto vuestro.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
